ProductInfo.Features:
MMS(640x480)/GPRS/Email (800x600) via GSM Network; VGA picture and Video; Laser pointer; IR remote control (wireless)
Long Range Detection 85ft (25 meters); Wide angle (80 degree) lens; 22 infrared LEDs
Password Protection; Remote control by mobile phone; Multiple Entry watching capability
Motion activated capture of picture/video with sound; Built-in color LCD on camera; Color daytime and IR in the evening
Sound (Audio) recording; Realtime sound transmission; Miniature Size: 105x65x35 mm; Support up to 2G TFT(mini SD) card
ProductInfo.Name: BolyGuard Long Range BG30L MMS/GPRS/Email IR Wireless Surveillance Security Camera
